## Things to Do Before Class
Read Simpson (2018)

### Primary Readings
Simpson, G.L., 2018. [Modelling palaeoecological time series using generalised additive models](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fevo.2018.00149/full). Frontiers in Ecology and Evolution 6.

### Primary Readings
Mottl, O., Flantua, S.G.A., Bhatta, K.P., Felde, V.A., Giesecke, T., Goring, S., Grimm, E.C., Haberle, S., Hooghiemstra, H., Ivory, S., Kune≈°, P., Wolters, S., Seddon, A.W.R., Williams, J.W., 2021. [Global acceleration in rates of vegetation change over the last 18,000 years](https://www.science.org/doi/10.1126/science.abg1685). Science 321, 860-864.
*This paper uses GAMs as part of its overall statistical package and detection of significant rates-of-change.  A good example of the current state of the field.*
